channel.title: Comments on: Super Berry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: By: Haley
item.dc:creator: Haley
item.description:
I love super berry so much I’ve never switched it up lol
Also everyone at cloud chemistry are always so helpful and kind. Couldn’t ask for a better vape shop. Thank you for everything you guys do to get us our juice
item.content:encoded:
I love super berry so much I’ve never switched it up lol

Also everyone at cloud chemistry are always so helpful and kind. Couldn’t ask for a better vape shop. Thank you for everything you guys do to get us our juice

item.title: By: Richard Richards

item.title: By: Dave Coppinger
item.dc:creator: Dave Coppinger
item.description: Love this juice! I used to live in Pennsylvania and now I live in Missouri. I have this shipped because I can't find another juice like it.
item.content:encoded: Love this juice! I used to live in Pennsylvania and now I live in Missouri. I have this shipped because I can’t find another juice like it.

item.title: By: Michelle
item.dc:creator: Michelle
item.description: Very tasty juice! It's is truly a satisfying berry flavor!
item.content:encoded: Very tasty juice! It’s is truly a satisfying berry flavor!
